org.eclipse.swt.examples.paint

クラス TextFigure

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.swt.examples.paint.Figure

  • public class TextFigure
extends Figure
    2D Rectangle object

    • コンストラクタの詳細

      • TextFigure

        public TextFigure(org.eclipse.swt.graphics.Color color,
          org.eclipse.swt.graphics.Font font,
          java.lang.String text,
          int x,
          int y)
        Constructs a TextFigure
        パラメータ:
        color - the color for this object
        font - the font for this object
        text - the text to draw, tab and new-line expansion is performed
        x - the virtual X coordinate of the top-left corner of the text bounding box
        y - the virtual Y coordinate of the top-left corner of the text bounding box

    • メソッドの詳細

      • draw

        public void draw(FigureDrawContext fdc)
        クラスからコピーされた説明: Figure
        Draws this object.
        定義:
        draw クラス内 Figure
        パラメータ:
        fdc - a parameter block specifying drawing-related information

      • addDamagedRegion

        public void addDamagedRegion(FigureDrawContext fdc,
                    org.eclipse.swt.graphics.Region region)
        クラスからコピーされた説明: Figure
        Computes the damaged screen region caused by drawing this object (imprecise), then appends it to the supplied region.
        定義:
        addDamagedRegion クラス内 Figure
        パラメータ:
        fdc - a parameter block specifying drawing-related information
        region - a region to which additional damage areas will be added
